name: AiRena
description:
Click here to play on AirConsole

AiRena is a fast paced local multiplayer party game. 2-4 players can battle each other. The ultimate goal of this instant kill game is to be the first to reach 10 kills through head jumps or items.

Gather your friends in front of a screen and turn your mobile phones into controllers just like in the good old console times.

This game uses AirConsole technology.

Do you have feedback? Please let us know!
